name: 華經科技股份有限公司
description:
<公司簡介>
華經資訊成立於民國66年4月，於民國88年12月股票上櫃、民國90年9月股票上市(#2468)。本公司台北總部下轄中壢、台中與高雄分公司，並設立新竹及雲嘉南辦事處，透過在地化與區域整合，建構全國性的服務網絡。
 
華經資訊針對產業趨勢與客戶不同領域的專業需求，著力於推展雲端運用、擴大虛擬化應用層面、強化資安、海量資料應用之解決方案，並持續進行市場行銷，建置華經自有應用軟體品牌。我們的服務包含企業公/私有雲基礎架構建置與規劃、網路系統規劃、資訊安全、備份備援規劃、金融機構資訊整合服務、雲端監控管理、軟體發展、專案開發、視訊投影產品整合、文件微縮影像製作、資訊影像處理、文件數位化、物流倉儲管理系統、壽險軟體、保險產業資訊服務及資訊設備委外維護管理等全方位資訊整合服務，並以提供專業整體委外服務為努力的目標。
 
華經的優勢包括擁有完善的售後服務、多元化的解決方案，不僅經驗豐富，更有原廠技術團隊的支援，多年來的經營財務穩健且深獲客戶的肯定！
 
<經營理念>
成立以來，華經資訊即秉持著「誠信、創新、服務」的理念，積極朝向多角化、多元化與高附加價值的服務事業經營發展。代理全球最先進的資訊科技產品，整合優秀的菁英團隊及遍佈全國的據點，為客戶提供最具規模及技術能力的資訊系統整合與專業服務，成為客戶的資訊服務最佳夥伴，是我們最感到驕傲的成就。
 
<願景與使命>
邁入二十一世紀，資訊化的腳步進程越來越快，各行各業電腦化、自動化的需求也日益增加，資訊服務業的產品也不斷地推陳出新。為了因應快速發展的資訊服務體系，華經資訊以「不斷升級的新動力」出發，隨時都能提供更快捷、更完善的專業服務來滿足客戶的需求。展望未來，華經資訊將更積極朝向多元化、多角化的方向前進，以創新的產品與專業的技術，提昇整體的服務品質，為建立更美好的資訊新生活而努力。

name: Skyline Software Systems, Inc
description:
Skyline Software Systems, Inc. is the leading provider of 3D earth visualization software and services. Skyline offers a platform of applications, tools and services for the creation and dissemination of customized, interactive, photo-realistic 3D environments. Focusing on core competencies of 3D earth visualization, data fusion, terrain analysis and collaboration, Skyline delivers a set of tools that delivers on the needs of enterprise customers: flexibility; efficiency and robustness. Skyline’s applications and services have been selected as the best-of-breed solution by government, military, intelligence and commercial clients across the globe.

Skyline’s core product offering, SkylineGlobe, is a web-enabled, interactive 3D globe that supports macro earth level views down to photorealistic street-level urbanscapes and underground views. As a data fusion platform, SkylineGlobe enables the enterprise users to aggregate information in their native format, projections, and resolutions from disparate “data silos”, into a single, unified, easy to understand 3D view. Real-time data fusion capabilities enables the integration of “live” data feeds including full motion video, asset tracking, and sensor data. SkylineGlobe’s architecture incorporates a very robust API/SDK that offers unparalleled flexibility to create customized user-interfaces and tools tailored to meet the needs of a wide range of end users.

Skyline’s Photomesh product addresses the problem of 3D building model availability. PhotoMesh allows the rapid and intuitive generation of complete photo-textured 3D mesh models from sets of unordered 2D images. PhotoMesh’s automated 3D modeling process greatly reduces the time, effort, expense and resources associated with traditional 3D model creation.

name: InLoox
description:
InLoox steht für nahtloses Projektmanagement für Microsoft 365. 

Als führender Anbieter von Projektmanagement-Software, die Zusammenarbeit, Effizienz und Produktivität optimiert, stellen wir leistungsstarke und benutzerfreundliche Lösungen für Projektplanung, Projektdurchführung und Projekt-Controlling & -Auswertung zur Verfügung - für einen reibungslosen Projektablauf und nachhaltigen Erfolg für Ihr Team und Unternehmen. 

 

UNSERE PRODUKTE & SERVICES 

- InLoox für Outlook & Microsoft 365: Verwandeln Sie Microsoft Outlook in eine komfortable Projektmanagement-Plattform. Machen Sie E-Mails zu Projektaufgaben, Anhänge zu Projektdokumenten und erfassen Sie Kalender-Termine als Projektarbeitszeiten. Planen, steuern und überwachen Sie Projekte direkt in Ihrer gewohnten E-Mail- und Kalenderumgebung. 

- InLoox Web App: Projektplanung, Ressourcenzuweisung und Projektauswertung waren noch nie so flexible wie mit InLoox Web App im Browser. Arbeiten Sie effizient im Team und Abteilungsübergreifend zusammen, verfolgen Sie den Fortschritt in Echtzeit und behalten Sie Aufgaben, Budgets und Auslastung im Blick. 

 

WARUM INLOOX? 

+ Professionelle Projektmanagement-Tools mit Kanban, Gantt, Zeiterfassung, Budgets, Berichten und Controlling-Dashboards für messbar erfolgreichere Projekte. 

+ Projektzusammenarbeit in Echtzeit für bessere Kommunikation im Team und einfach zugänglichen Projektinfos für alle Beteiligten. 

+ Nahtlose Microsoft Integration mit SharePoint für Dokumentenmanagement im Projektkontext. 

+ Skalierbare und anpassbare Lösung mit herausragendem Kundensupport und partnerschaftlicher Kundenzusammenarbeit. 

+ Kostenloses Onboarding durch das InLoox Customer Success Team für den unkomplizierten Start mit einer der besten Projektmanagement-Software Lösungen am Markt. 

 

InLoox wird seit der Gründung 1999 von mehr als 60.000 Anwendern genutzt und ist bei führenden Unternehmen weltweit für das erfolgreiche Projektmanagement im Einsatz. Zu den Kunden zählen unter anderen Bayrische Rotes Kreuz, Canon, DB Schenker, Fendt, Fraunhofer, Liebherr, iDM, REWE, SBB, US Airways und viele mehr.

Unser Datenschutzkonzept
Das Herzstück von effektiven Datenschutzkonzepten ist die Datenschutzmanagementsoftware 2B Advice PrIME, mit der mehr als 3.800 Unternehmen weltweit ihre Datenschutzkonzepte gemäß DSGVO, CCPA, COPPA und anderen Vorschriften verwalten können.

2B Advice PrIME ist eine umfassende
Datenschutzmanagementsoftware, die Ihnen die Verwaltung von Richtlinien, Verarbeitungstätigkeiten, internen bzw. externen Audits, Tracking der Datenflüsse, Berichterstellung, Compliance, Mitarbeiterschulungen, Richtlinienerstellung, Auskunftsersuchen und Risikominimierung ermöglicht. Die 2B Advice PrIME Technologie ist simpel genug, um die Datenschutzverpflichtungen eines kleinen Unternehmens zu verwalten, aber leistungsstark genug, um in einem weltweiten Unternehmen eingesetzt zu werden – ein echter Maßstab für eine Datenschutzmanagementsoftware.

name: Marco Technologies LLC
description:
We're not too big. We're not too small.
Technology is a different animal. It can be expensive. Hard to wrap your head around. Overwhelming to keep up with. And yet it's usually critical to the success of your business. It's not the kind of purchase you make once and forget about. Because like your business, it's always changing. That's why choosing the right technology provider is so important.
At Marco, we know how immense and fluid technology can feel. So we do everything we can to match you up with the right technology and keep it running smoothly day in and day out. We'll keep an eye out for products and processes that could save you precious time and money. And, we'll help you avoid the ones that won't.
We're big enough to offer you premium quality and selection. And we're small enough to give you personalized service grounded in Midwestern values. As your technology partner, we offer you the perfect mix of both worlds.
Where it all started.
Back in 1973, Gary Marsden and Dave Marquardt (whose last names inspired the "Mar" in Marco) started as a small typewriter shop in St. Cloud, Minnesota. Four decades later we've evolved into one of the top five technology providers in the nation, serving customers nationally with core offices in Minnesota, Wisconsin, North Dakota, South Dakota, Iowa, Illinois, Nebraska and Missouri.  We help organizations of all sizes make the most of their voice, data, video and print technology.
Employee loved.
We're pretty passionate about doing things right. Our employees are committed to doing what's best for our customers and giving back to the community. And we've created a culture that's consistently recognized with state and national top workplace honors. Learn more about our culture.
Why Marco
One Source - From planning and design through installation and support, we apply our network expertise to voice, data, video and print solutions.
Expect Satisfaction - We've been conducting monthly customer surveys and documenting results since 1994 to ensure we meet your expectations.
Caring and Committed - We believe it's not enough for a business to do well; it must also do "good." On the job and off, Marco is made up of people who care.
Innovation Leader - When you connect with Marco, you benefit from the innovation and resources of our industry leading partners.

name: Skyline Software Systems, Inc
description:
Skyline Software Systems, Inc. is the leading provider of 3D earth visualization software and services. Skyline offers a platform of applications, tools and services for the creation and dissemination of customized, interactive, photo-realistic 3D environments. Focusing on core competencies of 3D earth visualization, data fusion, terrain analysis and collaboration, Skyline delivers a set of tools that delivers on the needs of enterprise customers: flexibility; efficiency and robustness. Skyline’s applications and services have been selected as the best-of-breed solution by government, military, intelligence and commercial clients across the globe.

Skyline’s core product offering, SkylineGlobe, is a web-enabled, interactive 3D globe that supports macro earth level views down to photorealistic street-level urbanscapes and underground views. As a data fusion platform, SkylineGlobe enables the enterprise users to aggregate information in their native format, projections, and resolutions from disparate “data silos”, into a single, unified, easy to understand 3D view. Real-time data fusion capabilities enables the integration of “live” data feeds including full motion video, asset tracking, and sensor data. SkylineGlobe’s architecture incorporates a very robust API/SDK that offers unparalleled flexibility to create customized user-interfaces and tools tailored to meet the needs of a wide range of end users.

Skyline’s Photomesh product addresses the problem of 3D building model availability. PhotoMesh allows the rapid and intuitive generation of complete photo-textured 3D mesh models from sets of unordered 2D images. PhotoMesh’s automated 3D modeling process greatly reduces the time, effort, expense and resources associated with traditional 3D model creation.

name: Aware
description:
Unblock and Unleash Collaboration in Teams & Yammer for All Employees!

Aware is the single-source solution to address compliance, data governance and 
human behavior risk within platforms like Microsoft Teams and Yammer. Satisfy concerns from key stakeholders like:

Legal & Compliance |  Information Security  |  Human Resources

Aware Product Overview
Monitoring
Automate community management of Yammer with configurable rules, conditions and responses. For example, monitor for inappropriate/harassing behavior or unsafe sharing practices that might lead to an insider threat.
Search & Discover
Give your customer’s eDiscovery team a more efficient, effective way to access private & public communication data—including edited or deleted content stored within the Aware archive. 
Retention
Allow your customer to apply their records retention policies and automatically purge select content from collaboration platform and the archive.
Data Holds
Preserve selected user’s content and satisfy the need to create and release legal holds.
User Data Removal
Remove all of a user’s authored content with the click of a button. This efficiently satisfies user data removal requests, as outlined by the GDPR.

Companies trust Aware to monitor and manage risk associated with the unstructured chat conversations in their Teams & Yammer environments.

description:
宏碁公司創立於1976年，是全球頂尖的資通訊公司之一，宏碁一直以打破人與科技的藩籬視為企業使命，全球約有超過7,500名員工致力於研發、設計、行銷、販售、產品服務和各式解決方案，業務橫跨160個國家。

我們相信科技是人類發展的重要基石，隨著產業及生活型態的轉變，世界各地的人群及組織逐漸改變工作及生活的方式，我們希望帶給消費者最創新的科技技術。除此之外，我們也透過旗下Earthion平台持續致力於環境議題，並承諾於2035年使用100%可再生能源。

主要商品 / 服務項目
宏碁從消費者的角度出發，致力開發創新且貼近使用者需求的產品、並提供良好的使用者經驗以滿足消費者的期待；此外因企業在環境、社會及治理方面的努力名列多項全球永續發展指標認可。

name: ClicData
description:
ClicData is a 100% cloud-based Business Intelligence and data management platform that allows you to connect, manage, prep, visualize and share your data easily. 

	1. Connect data from multiple sources 
ClicData integrates with hundreds of marketing, sales, financial, e-commerce, ERP applications with native connectors. We also allow you to connect to cloud-based or on-premise databases. 
You can also connect to thousands of more applications through API. 

	2. Store and manage data in a built-in data warehouse
Keep track of your historical data and millions of records in your own data warehouse. You can compare your data over time. 
It's also easier to keep your data safe and secure with advanced users' privileges management. 

	3. Extensive ETL features
With ClicData you can do extended data processing actions such as data cleansing, merge, fusions, agregation, etc. to dig deeper into your data. 

	4. Automated schedules & alerts
Making data-driven decisions means being able to rely on the latest data. 
With ClicData, you can set data refreshed on each dataset every month, every week, every day, up to every minute! Stay on top of your data and KPIs: get notified automatically when your data reached critical thresholds to take actions faster. 

	5. Custom dashboards & drag-and-drop designer
Build insightful dashboards to turn your data into actionable information in minutes. With our 70+ interactive visualization options, including interactive maps, drill-down charts, powerful pivot tables, or 3D scatter plots, you can display your data the way you want it! 

	6. Share & collaborate with real-time data
Your dashboards are useful only if they are shared within your team and organization. All your dashboards can be accessible via a private link on any browser and device at any time. Align your team and organization on a single version of the truth. 
You can also schedule report deliveries via email to keep yourself and your team updated on your KPIs every day, before you finish your first cup of coffee. 

	7. Data security: ClicData is a Microsoft Gold Partner
Your data is safely stored in data centers, maintained and monitored by Microsoft, the leading global hosting and infrastructure provider. Nobody has access to the data except you and the people to whom you explicitly give permission.

ClicData offers a free trial period.

It entails capabilities, reference architectures and best practices for customers with SAP footprint helping customers compare and contrast the Modern services with corresponding offerings in the SAP ecosystem.
2) Intelligent Enterprise - A modern-day approach using Microsoft Azure cloud platform to apply cutting edge algorithms to leverage prescriptive and descriptive analytics via a real-time dashboard. The main solutions focus on being demand planning, demand sensing, ML power forecasting, production planning, and scheduling, Multi-Echelon Optimized Distribution Plans, etc.

It offers timely, concise and contextual information that cuts all the noise and helps take appropriate actions, reducing your need to access ERP/CRM dashboards by 90% or more.

Local and remote resources for a cost effective solution. We have successfully delivered more than 200+ Microsoft Dynamics project across 57 customers around the globe. Infosys has also successfully rolled more than 25+ Case management and Power Platform for its Enterprise Customers.

name: Braathe Gruppen AS
description:
Braathes visjon er å levere bekymringsfri IT til våre kunder. 

Vi er en ledende forhandler av IT-produkter og tjenester for små til mellomstore bedrifter i Norge. Vi samarbeider med våre kunder for å finne de IT-løsningene som passer deres behov best, og som gir dem merverdi. Braathe er godkjent storkundeforvalter for Microsoft (LSP) og er Microsoft CSP tier 1-partner.

Siden Braathe ble etablert i 1989 har vi fokusert på å bygge langvarige relasjoner til våre kunder og partnere. Vi er en familieeid bedrift som ser fremover og jobber kontinuerlig med å utvikle og utvide tilbudet vårt med nye tjenester og løsninger. Vi er alle teknologientusiaster og bygger kompetanse gjennom løpende sertifiseringer innen den nyeste teknologien i sektoren. I Braathe jobber vi også målrettet med sikkerhet og bærekraft.  

Kunder kan i dag treffe oss på en av våre 10 lokasjoner i Norge. Som en totalleverandør av IT-tjenester kan vi tilby kunder tjenester og produkter fra A til Å. Gjennom vårt omfattende nettverk av partnere har vi tilgang på de beste tjeneste og produktene i sektoren. Vi tilbyr gunstige betingelser til både kjøp og leie. 

Med et kundespektrum som går på tvers av en rekke sektorer, både i det offentlige og det private næringsliv, har vi omfattende erfaring med: 
•	Digital transformasjon: Skyløsninger, Digital Utvikling og Brukeradopsjon
•	Digital arbeidsplass: Dektop i Skyen, Microsoft 365 Arbeidsplass, Managed Microsoft 365, Device as a Service, 365 Backup, alle med fri norsk brukersupport 
•	IT-løsninger: Software Asset Management med administrering og optimalisering av lisenser, distribusjon, vedlikehold, bruk og avhending av programvare
•	Sikkerhetstjenester og innføring i sikkerhetskultur: Tilgang på læringsplattformen Pistachio
•	Skytjenester og infrastruktur: Offentlig og privat nettsky, datasenter i Norge, Managed Services, og Network as a Service
•	Software as a Service: digital skilting, telefoni, WebTV, PDS bookingsystem, og Managed Web
•	Digital utvikling: Utviklingsprosjekter, Microsoft Power Plattform, SharePoint

Les om hvordan det er å være kunde hos Braathe på https://braathe.no/suksesshistorier/

-ISO 45001:2018 – Ledelsessystemer for arbeidsmiljø

З 2019-го року створюємо передові технологічні рішення, які відповідають унікальним потребам клієнтів.​

​SoftTim – ваш надійний партнер у сфері інформаційних технологій.​
Основною цінністю для компанії є лояльність клієнтів.

name: Skyline Software Systems, Inc
description:
Skyline Software Systems, Inc. is the leading provider of 3D earth visualization software and services. Skyline offers a platform of applications, tools and services for the creation and dissemination of customized, interactive, photo-realistic 3D environments. Focusing on core competencies of 3D earth visualization, data fusion, terrain analysis and collaboration, Skyline delivers a set of tools that delivers on the needs of enterprise customers: flexibility; efficiency and robustness. Skyline’s applications and services have been selected as the best-of-breed solution by government, military, intelligence and commercial clients across the globe.

Skyline’s core product offering, SkylineGlobe, is a web-enabled, interactive 3D globe that supports macro earth level views down to photorealistic street-level urbanscapes and underground views. As a data fusion platform, SkylineGlobe enables the enterprise users to aggregate information in their native format, projections, and resolutions from disparate “data silos”, into a single, unified, easy to understand 3D view. Real-time data fusion capabilities enables the integration of “live” data feeds including full motion video, asset tracking, and sensor data. SkylineGlobe’s architecture incorporates a very robust API/SDK that offers unparalleled flexibility to create customized user-interfaces and tools tailored to meet the needs of a wide range of end users.

Skyline’s Photomesh product addresses the problem of 3D building model availability. PhotoMesh allows the rapid and intuitive generation of complete photo-textured 3D mesh models from sets of unordered 2D images. PhotoMesh’s automated 3D modeling process greatly reduces the time, effort, expense and resources associated with traditional 3D model creation.

La proximité, l'écoute, la réactivité sont des valeurs essentielles qui reflètent au travers de tous nos projets. Nous avons la volonté de mettre en place un véritable partenariat à long terme, car votre projet nous le vivons avec vous, de bout en bout.

LA TRANSPARENCE
Tout projet amène son lot d'inattendus et nous en sommes conscients. Notre méthodologie projet interactive nous permet de localiser rapidement tout point de blocage pour étudier ensemble les solutions possibles et continuer dʼavancer dans le projet.

UN ACCOMPAGNEMENT SANS DÉPENDANCE

name: Iver Sverige AB
description:
Det blir alltid best når man kjenner hverandre

Hos Iver begynner alt med partnerskap. I 20 år har vi utfordret IT-gigantene med effektive leveranser, høyt servicenivå og langsiktige relasjoner. Slik hjelper vi deg med å løse bedriftens tøffeste utfordringer.

Kontinuerlig forretningsutvikling og en proaktiv arbeidsmåte gjør bedriften forberedt på alle eventualiteter.

Felles for selskapene som nå har dannet Iver, er at vi alltid jobber for å skape en kundeopplevelse i verdensklasse. På en bærekraftig måte skaper vi nytteverdi for deg, for medarbeiderne våre og for samfunnet.

Velkommen til Iver!

name: KINETIC IT PTY LTD
description:
Kinetic IT is a leading Australian-owned provider of enterprise-class ICT solutions. We partner with some of our nation’s most important organisations, helping them deliver essential services relied upon by our communities including education, law enforcement, defence, emergency, utilities and transport. Our customers are private and public-sector organisations seeking high quality solutions and efficient service delivery within some of the largest and most complex environments in the country. Key to our success is proven experience and capability, a commitment to best-practice methodologies and a refreshing penchant for flexibility and customer focus.
Our core lines of business are:

BUSINESS AND DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
Customers choose Transform services when desiring widespread business, cultural and experiential change. The breadth of our transformation services spans a range of technology and business areas, including driving adoption of mobile and field-based technologies, HR enablement, digital workspaces, robotic processes, Internet-of-Things deployments, advanced intelligence and data visualisation solutions.

MANAGED ENTERPRISE TECHNOLOGY
Kinetic IT managed service offerings include service desk, application support, infrastructure management, hybrid and native cloud, network management, data centres, lifecycle asset management and enterprise mobility. Our dedicated resourcing model and localised management structure enables customers to benefit from agile service delivery that adapts and aligns with evolving needs and environments.

CYBER INFORMATION AND SECURITY
Kinetic IT PROTECT+ represents the next phase in cyber security innovation. Our PROTECT+ Threat Intelligence and Response services are delivered through our world-class WA-based Security Operations Centre (SOC). The PROTECT+ security consulting team offers specialist threat assessments and attack modelling, incident response readiness assessments, tabletop scenario planning and execution, as well as all guidance and assistance on security strategy, policy, process, architecture and security awareness training for customers.

ADVISORY AND CONSULTING
Kinetic IT offers mature business and technology Advisory and Consulting capabilities, bringing industry best practice to our customers’ organisations.  Leveraging deep insight, our advisory and consulting services include comprehensive organisational assessments, technology strategy advice, and tried-and-tested integrated methodologies.
